docs.lead_paragraph: THE sun, that mighty deity whom the ancients worshiped and the catacomb Christians fled, is claiming a new host of twentieth-century devotees. He who was known as Mithras of the Persians, Phoebus Apollo of the ...

headline.main: MODERN WORSHIPERS OF THAT OLD GOD, THE SUN; The Growing Cult of Today Has Its Rituals and Also Its Miracles of Healing, And Supplying Its Ceremonial Garments Absorbs Whole Industries
